text: Starfighter Pilot was the debut, or first, EP from the alternative rock band Snow Patrol, and was finished in 1997. It was released on the Electric Honey record label. The song "Starfighter Pilot" was also put on the band's first full-length album, Songs for Polarbears. ==Track listing== #"Starfighter Pilot" #"Holy Cow" #"Safety" Category:1997 albums
title: Starfighter Pilot
